channel.title: Need help finding 1 line of code in thrillscapes player.java
channel.description:
in thrillscape 317 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=493873.0
where do i set player rights to 0 for item loss on death in player.java
( i want safe pking everywhere ) I also need it to where all players can ::pickup and all players have the 4 quests completed upon logging in. could really use some help here please please please
how do i set the clients ip and the servers ip also
